explains: adj. 偏僻的；弯曲的；不光明正大的

sentences.en: He got rich by devious means.
She is devious and sly and manipulative.
sentences.cn: 她阴险、狡诈，而且爱操纵他人。

sentences.en: Newman was certainly devious, prepared to say one thing in print and something quite different in private.
sentences.cn: 纽曼确实狡诈，随时都能当众说一套，私下说一套。
